full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,RLUNG RTA YAR LA BSKYED PA'I BSANG YID BZHIN BANG MDZOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , ` YUL LHA GZHI BDAG PADMA SNYING PO BSANGS BZHUGS SO, , *, ,RLUNG RTA YAR LA BSKYED PA'I BSANG YID BZHIN BANG MDZOD ZHES BYA BA NI,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @002A *, ,(CES PA 'DI NI DGE SLONG NGAG DBANG TSUL KHRIMS SOGS DON GNYER CAN 'GA' ZHIG GIS BSKUL BA'I NGOR, BTZUN PA DKON MCHOG 'JIGS MED DBANG POS SBYAR BA'O,, ,,)
